name: Multitask-Multidimensional Adventure
description:
Find multitasking easy? Try and keep up in this retro-styled single player game! Play several fun minigames, from bullet hell to pong... all at the same time! Sure they're easy enough on their own, but can you deal with them all simultaneously? 

Get to choose from three difficulty modes, or mutlitask to your limit and claim the global high score in arcade mode!
